select pimg.play_poster_stored_file_name as img_name , p.play_name as play_name , p.play_id as play_id , CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(s.showing_start_at, '%Y-%m-%d') , ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(s.showing_end_at, '%Y-%m-%d')) as showing_period_date , s.showing_date , DATEDIFF(s.showing_date, CURDATE()) as dday from play p left join play_image pimg on p.play_id = pimg.play_id left join ( SELECT s1.play_id, min(s1.showing_date) showing_date, s1.showing_start_at showing_start_at, s1.showing_end_at showing_end_at, CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(s1.showing_start_at, '%Y-%m-%d') , ' ~ ', DATE_FORMAT(s1.showing_end_at, '%Y-%m-%d')) as showing_period_date FROM showing s1 left JOIN ( SELECT play_id, MIN(showing_date) AS min_showing_date FROM showing GROUP BY play_id ) s2 on s1.play_id = s2.play_id group by s1.play_id, s1.showing_start_at, s1.showing_end_at, showing_period_date ) s on p.play_id = s.play_id where 1=1 and s.showing_period_date is not null group by p.play_id ,img_name, p.play_name, showing_period_date, showing_start_at, showing_end_at, dday
